captions.text: I can't wait
I'd like to date you after I get out
But I hit on you everytime I'm on break
Please wait for me
You can date other guys in the meantime
Just be home by 2200 hours
It's been a while since I've gone clubbing
I put on my jacket for some swag
That's when I see her with another guy
It's okay
and endless lonely nights
you're not answering my calls
I miss you
I can't wait
It's a long way until I get out
But I know your level of patience
Not him
He's been after you for a while
Don't take his calls after 2200 hours
Baby just two years though
I can't wait
I told the moon while on duty
That I miss you so much
Please tell her
I'll be back a better man
That I'll be out before the next full moon
Baby it's just two years
I can't wait
I'd like to date you after I get out
But I hit on you everytime I'm on break
Please wait for me
You can date other guys in the meantime
but remember I love you 24 hours a day
I'm all yours

comments.text:
My oppa just left for the army last month and told me to wait for him ;-; I 
still have 21 months left to wait and the waiting is killing me. I just 
found this song and it makes me smile every time I hear it, he told me he 
will miss me every day and this song reminds me that he told me he will 
never forget me. Thank you Eddy Kim for making me smile through a hard 
time!﻿
